paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various treatment strategies for cardiac amyloidosis, focusing on both AL and ATTR types. It mentions several therapies targeting the TTR gene but does not provide specific genetic variant data for TTR.

challenges: The paper did not provide specific genetic variant data for the TTR gene.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focused on treatment strategies and did not include specific genetic variant information for the TTR gene.
